data.name: New Lands Paradise Island Collector's Edition Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the original soundtracks to New Lands Paradise Island Collector's Edition including 5 tracks in different themes.
We have collected for you amazing soundtracks, which will help to feel the gorgeous atmosphere.
